definition.name: Deploy Ghost Theme
definition.description: Build & deploy a theme to your Ghost site
definition.author: TryGhost

inputs.name: exclude
inputs.description: Files or folders to exclude (space-separated list)

inputs.name: theme-name
inputs.description: A custom theme name that overrides the default name in package.json

inputs.name: file
inputs.description: Path to a built zip file. If this is included, the `exclude` and `theme-name` options are ignored

inputs.name: working-directory
inputs.description: A custom directory to zip when a theme is in a subdirectory
